ComicInfo.Summary:
When John Constantine and Epiphany Greaves see a trashy werewolf movie it triggers disturbing memories of guilty sexual stirrings, lycanthropic aristocrats and socially mobile gangsters. But can John remember who was in that little red riding hood? And can Epiphany be sure what kind of beast she's sleeping with? Find out in the one-shot tale 'The House of Wolves' featuring art by the amazing Simon Bisley.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-07-22 21:36:39. [CVDB341870]
